Txt_Talk_DesertShrine_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Do you seek the magic key, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>?
*: In the northern part of the desert stands a great pyramid. It is within its depths that you will find the key. But beware<--->for it is a most treacherous place, filled with fiendish traps.
*: Before you enter, you must seek knowledge of its various contrivances in Ibis. Look for a great oasis to the west and there you shall find the city.
*: Then I shall not tell you that which you do not wish to hear...
